testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Test Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "End Date"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click the import question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then The import questions dialog appears
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I select the question "Test Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Test Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click on the calendar icon next to the "End Date" policy
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I see the date picker
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I click the next month button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I click to close the date picker
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I see that the End Date checkbox is set to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the policies page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "End Date" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I navigate to the Maple TA login page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I enter valid credentials for user sally
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I start the "End Date" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I confirm to submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the "View Past Results" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I am in the Gradebook
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: When I click the Details link for the "End Date" module
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date

testcase.name: Then I see the test record details of "End Date" for user "sally"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that feedback is not restricted if the assignment has an end date
